title: [HOLD for payment 2025-01-02] [$250] Add "Workspace" to Profile and Name at the workspace level for clarity
issue_repo_steps:
## Problem The use of "Profile" at both the personal account level and at the workspace level. i was configuring the workspace settings, and seeing Profile > Name under the workspace almost prompted me to update that field with my own name (vs. the workspace name). ## Solution Add "Workspace" in front of all those. So: - Workspace profile (LHN) - Workspace profile (Page title) - Workspace name (name field) Super basic label updates in the first screenshot: Second screenshot has the same label updates but also includes an icon and illustration update to tie into the visual language we typically use for workspaces: ____ Slack thread for additional context - https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07NZ8B1VTQ/p1732116570767239
